1110000001111110 0011000001010100 0 -> sum: 0001000011010010, cout: 1
0000010001110111 1000111010001011 0 -> sum: 1001001100000010, cout: 0
1011110110101101 1011111111100011 1 -> sum: 0111110110010001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
